NH48 API crawl guide for LLM and search agents.

Site: https://nh48.info/
Primary domain: https://nh48.info/
Photo CDN: https://photos.nh48.info/

Canonical discovery URLs:
- https://nh48.info/
- https://nh48.info/catalog
- https://nh48.info/catalog/ranges
- https://nh48.info/dataset
- https://nh48.info/dataset/wmnf-trails
- https://nh48.info/dataset/long-trails
- https://nh48.info/dataset/howker-plants
- https://nh48.info/photos/
- https://nh48.info/trails
- https://nh48.info/long-trails
- https://nh48.info/nh-4000-footers-info

Machine-readable sources:
- https://nh48.info/sitemap.xml
- https://nh48.info/page-sitemap.xml
- https://nh48.info/image-sitemap.xml
- https://nh48.info/data/nh48.json
- https://nh48.info/data/trails_with_osm.json
- https://nh48.info/data/wmnf-trails/wmnf-main.json
- https://nh48.info/data/long-trails-index.json
- https://nh48.info/data/long-trails-full.json
- https://nh48.info/data/howker-plants.json
